officialTitle: BP-EASE-A 12-Week, Multicenter, Open-Label, Randomized, Controlled Trial To Compare The Effectiveness of Losartan 50 mg/HCTZ 12.5 mg Titrated as Needed to Losartan 100 mg/HCTZ 25 mg or Valsartan 160 mg/HCTZ 25 mg, in Patients With Essential Hypertension Who Have Not Achieved Target Blood Pressure With
